LEFT JOIN SYS_OFFICE p ON p.id = a.parent_id LEFT JOIN SYS_AREA ar ON ar.id = a.area_id LEFT JOIN SYS_USER pp ON pp.id = a.primary_person LEFT JOIN SYS_USER dp ON dp.id = a.deputy_person LEFT JOIN SYS_DICT di ON di.value = a.hospital_grade AND di.type = 'hospital_grade'
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM SYS_OFFICE a
WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
ORDER BY a.code

SELECT
FROM SYS_OFFICE a
WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND a.parent_ids LIKE #{parentIds} AND a.office_type= #{officeType}
AND a.area_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{area.id}, '%')
AND a.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
ORDER BY a.code
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SYS_OFFICE( id, parent_id, parent_ids, area_id, code, name, sort, type, office_type, grade, address, zip_code, master, phone, fax, email, hospital_grade, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, useable, primary_person, deputy_person, policy_number, is_insured, insurance_company, insured_time, beds, legal_representative, represent_phone, director_charge, director_phone, dispute_head, dispute_phone, insured_end_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parent.id}, #{parentIds}, #{area.id}, #{code}, #{name}, #{sort}, #{type}, #{officeType}, #{grade}, #{address}, #{zipCode}, #{master}, #{phone}, #{fax}, #{email}, #{hospitalGrade}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{useable}, #{primaryPerson.id}, #{deputyPerson.id}, #{policyNumber}, #{isInsured}, #{insuranceCompany}, #{insuredTime}, #{beds}, #{legalRepresentative}, #{representPhone}, #{directorCharge}, #{directorPhone}, #{disputeHead}, #{disputePhone}, #{insuredEndTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE SYS_OFFICE SET parent_id = #{parent.id}, parent_ids = #{parentIds}, area_id = #{area.id}, code = #{code}, name = #{name}, type = #{type}, office_type = #{officeType}, grade = #{grade}, address = #{address}, zip_code = #{zipCode}, master = #{master}, phone = #{phone}, fax = #{fax}, email = #{email}, hospital_grade = #{hospitalGrade} , update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, useable=#{useable}, primary_person=#{primaryPerson.id}, deputy_person=#{deputyPerson.id}, policy_number=#{policyNumber}, is_insured=#{isInsured}, insurance_company=#{insuranceCompany}, insured_time=#{insuredTime}, beds=#{beds}, legal_representative=#{legalRepresentative}, represent_phone=#{representPhone}, director_charge=#{directorCharge}, director_phone=#{directorPhone}, dispute_head=#{disputeHead}, dispute_phone=#{disputePhone}, insured_end_time=#{insuredEndTime} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE SYS_OFFICE SET del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_DELETE} WHERE id = #{id} OR parent_ids LIKE '%,'||#{id}||',%' '%,'+#{id}+',%' CONCAT('%,', #{id}, ',%')
